text: The President of the Federal Senate, sometimes referred to as the President of the Senate, is elected from among their number by the members of the Brazilian Federal Senate. They stand third in the order of presidential succession, after the Vice-President of the Republic and the President of the Chamber of Deputies.Constitution of 5 October 1988, Art. 80.
